title: List of all Android obfuscation  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android obfuscation  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: AndroidLibrary
repoList.description: Android library to reveal or obfuscate strings and assets at runtime

repoList.name: LibPecker
repoList.description: an obfuscation-resilient, highly precise and reliable library detector for Android applications

repoList.name: MultiModule_Library_Obfuscation_Demo
repoList.description: This repo will describes the obfuscation challenges and solutions that an Android Multi Modular library application does have.

repoList.name: LibraryModularisation
repoList.description: This project consists of ways to demonstrate how to modularise your Android library keeping Obfuscation into consideration.

repoList.name: Android-Greeter-Library
repoList.description: A test application for learning how to use pro-guard and obfuscate library code before distribution.

repoList.name: PowerfulSharedPreferences
repoList.description: Android library with a powerful and easy SharedPreferences wrapper, with support for obfuscation, logs, multiple SharedPreferences files, type safety and callback on changes (optionally with Android LiveData).

repoList.name: android-sample-minifiedLib
repoList.description: Minify your android library to obfuscate your code when distributed
